  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.monkeys.Monkey<Banana>
  • Type Parameters:
    Banana - What a banana is
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChimpBeta, ChimpDirichlet, ChimpDiscrete, ChimpFlip, ChimpNormal, ChimpPermutation, ChimpPoisson, ChimpRand

    public abstract class Monkey<Banana>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract monkey. Bananas sold separately.
    Author:
    BenL

      • getValue

        public Banana getValue()
        Gets the banana, safely (ie. not by reference). Please override this function if Banana is not immutable. Otherwise, unexpected behavior may occur and monkey anarchy will ensue.
        Returns:
        value The Banana previously generated by generate() or regenerate();

      • generate

        public abstract Banana generate()
        Generates from the prior.
        Returns:
        value A Banana from the prior distribution of this Monkey.

      • propose

        public abstract Banana propose()
        Generates from the proposal kernel (ie. possibly depending on the previous value).
        Returns:
        value A proposal Banana

      • energy

        public abstract double energy()
        Returns the negative log-likelihood of the current value of this Monkey.
        Returns:
        energy The negative log-likelihood.

      • transitionEnergy

        public abstract double transitionEnergy(Banana fromvalue)
        Returns the negative log-likelihood of proposing the current value from a previous state fromvalue, given the current parameters.
        Parameters:
        fromvalue - Previous value
        Returns:
        energy The negative log-likelihood
